020
021
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Dialect;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.SQLEngine;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageManager;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.StandardSQL;
026
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.Map;
029
030public class MariaDB extends StandardSQL {
031
032  public MariaDB(final String prefix, Dialect dialect) {
033
034    super(prefix, dialect);
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * The name of this engine.
039   *
040   * @return The engine name.
041   */
042  @Override
043  public String name() {
044
045    return "maria";
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public String[] driver() {
050
051    return new String[]{
052            "org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver"
053    };
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public String[] dataSource() {
058
059    return new String[]{
060            "org.mariadb.jdbc.MariaDbDataSource"
061    };
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public String url(String file, String host, int port, String database) {
066
067    final String ssl = (StorageManager.instance().settings().ssl())? "trust" : "disable";
068    final StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder("jdbc:mariadb://");
069    builder.append(host);
070    builder.append(":");
071    builder.append(port);
072    builder.append("/");
073    builder.append(database);
074    builder.append("?allowPublicKeyRetrieval=");
075    builder.append(StorageManager.instance().settings().publicKey());
076    builder.append("&sslMode=");
077    builder.append(ssl);
078    return builder.toString();
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Used to get addition hikari properties for this {@link SQLEngine}.
083   *
084   * @return A map containing the additional properties.
085   */
086  @Override
087  public Map<String, Object> properties() {
088
089    return new HashMap<>();
090  }
091}
